data: Andrei Gruzinov Associate Professor Of Physics Theoretical astrophysics. Andrei Gruzinov Associate Professor Of Physics andrei@physics.nyu.edu 726 Broadway, Room 930 Phone: (212) 992-8783 Personal Homepage The Center for Cosmology and Particle Physics is a unique collaboration devoted to integrated study of cosmology, observational astronomy, fundamental and phenomenological particle physics, gravity, plasma physics, high energy astrophysics, black holes and computational physics. Please visit the center's Collegiate Professor;Professor of Physics The is a unique group of faculty, students and research scientists working together on fundamental questions at the intersection of particle physics, astrophysics and cosmology.
